answers.answer: A corpus is a large and structured set of text documents.
A corpus can be anywhere between thousands to millions of words.
A chatbot corpora cannot be built/trained by manually copy-pasting data into a .txt file
Chatbot corpora can only be built/trained on a large conversational dataset.

source.guidance:
Chatbot corpora can be built by manually copy pasting data into a text file. 
It can also be trained on any form of data (for eg. wikipedia pages, textbooks, large conversational datasets, etc) depending on the use case.
source.instructions:
## Which of the following are TRUE about chatbot corpora?

**Hint:** There may be more than one correct answer.
source.name: chatbotCorpus
